Why isit that everytime I need justify things aren't racist cuz Indian people say they are racist

So my division is giving a 0.5day PM OFF next friday to everyone cuz CNY eve  then they want everyone else to clear 0.5day AM OFF next Friday to not come camp (cause got division exercise going on) If don't have OFF use leave.All the indians in my office say it's a racially motivated move to force people to take AM LVE on that day
this is just another instance of microaggression where we as the minority have to do what the majority tells us to because of the decision they all in all likelihood made BECAUSE it is the eve of cny
They ignore the fact that all the Chinese people also have to waste 0.5day leave on this as well and their rationale is (oh it does not affect you as much)
Funniest part is one of our superiors who approved this isn't even chinese
And when I raised this up they say
"I like how yall just reduce him to just being an encik until it's a way to validate racism"
Just ask him to stop whining and take MC

My argument is its more of a lack of connection between regulars and nsfs in comparison to it being a race thingThen I raised the counter example of how Chinese nsfs do not get offs for Hari Raya eve or deepavali eve and stuff like that when they are all already promised a half day off. Apparently those situations aren't racist even though they operate on the same principle of majoritarianism
This is so stupid tho  the half off is non transferable anyway

They can justify why Chinese people should not get a half day off the day before minority holidays on the principle of pragmatismBut they use racism to justify why non Chinese people (when in actuality everyone is affected) when people are forced to take leave on a majority holiday eve

"ill reformulate my opinions when i get the full picture""but it definitely doesnt seem very fair right now regardless of whether the lack of equitability is of the race flavour  the majoritarian flavour or something else"
